title: LUXURY, FURNISHED STUDIO APARTMENT FOR RENT!
posting_body: ['LUXURY BOUTIQUE STYLE LIVING.', 'At KODO, we’re inspired by the connection and creativity that life in our neighborhood affords.', 'Here, residents are set within the heart of one of L.A.’s trendiest neighborhoods while moments from the cultural vibrancy of Downtown Los Angeles.', 'Home to several of L.A.’s best clubs, bars, live music venues and restaurants, Koreatown and Mid Wilshire are renowned for their nightlife and dining options, while the artistic allure of DTLA is a mere stone’s throw away.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 3', 'OR Text', '3', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 492 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Granite', '- Electronic Thermostat', '- Patio/Balcony - select units', '- Dishwasher - select units', '- Large Closets', '- Cable Ready', '- Window Coverings', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Refrigerator', '- Microwave', '- Pets - Max 2 allowed*', '- Washer and Dryer in Unit', '- High Ceilings', '- Gas Range', 'Community Amenities', '- The Rooftop Lounge with Stunning Views of Downtown Los Angeles', '- Dog Walking Service Available upon request*', '- Private Conference Room', '- Assigned Underground Parking Available*', '- Controlled Access Building', '- 24-hour Fitness Center Access', '- Elevator', '- Zen Courtyard and Co-working space', '- 24/7 Concierge Dry Cleaning*', '- Resident Lounge', '- Complimentary High-speed Internet access', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Verifiable Income Equal to or Greater than 2.5x Monthly Rent', 'Driving Directions', 'From Wilshire Blvd Eastbound: Make a Right on Wilshire Place & a Left on Sunset Place.', 'From Wilshire Blvd Westbound: Make a Left on Hoover, Right on 7th St, Right onto Wilshire Place & Right onto Sunset Place', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Kodo', '2867 Sunset Pl, Los Angeles, CA, 90005', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'enEKJog1F7Mk']
